alert.note: Alert for Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:41PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Manatee and southeastern Hillsborough Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 641 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms developing along a line extending from near Brandon to 8 miles north of Myakka City. Movement was southeast at 5 to 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brandon, Fish Hawk, Riverview, Boyette, Alafia River State Park, Myakka Head, Duette, Fort Lonesome, Lithia Springs State Park, Bloomingdale, Valrico, and Wimauma. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
